pr_title: Ignore duplicate NEVRAs in package profile update (bsc#1176018)

timeline.message:
Ignore duplicate NEVRAs in package profile update (bsc#1176018)

(cherry picked from commit 5055d41ce428e7bed466365db940505e62113081)

timeline.bodyText: @cbbayburt as the install date is something we use sometimes it would be good to keep the entry with the latest install date.
timeline.author: mcalmer
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1481,7 +1481,8 @@ private static void updatePackages(MinionServer server,
                 )
                 .collect(Collectors.toMap(
                         SaltUtils::packageToKey,
-                        Function.identity()
+                        Function.identity(),
+                        (first, duplicate) -> first // Deal with duplicates: ignore additional entries
